    record() - Method in class SystemEnvironment.Core
    Records a scheduling point if needed and creates a new SchedulingInfo when: status changes (E/I/W/C/M), the job associated with the state changes, lock usage changes (isChangeLock), or speed changes (isChangeSpeed).
    recoverInheritance() - Method in class WorkLoad.Job

    Repositions and redraws resource usage rectangles for EXECUTION segments directly onto the supplied graphics context, also writing textual labels (resource set ID, instance number, and total amount) when width allows.
